review: I've only had my fire stick about a week but so far it has exceeded my expectations. Couldn't be easier to use and does everything I need!
author: Erin Hopper

review: When it works it is good. However it randomly picks up wifi even though all other devices are working. Less than5 feet away from router. Tried all the tricks on Google. Would not buy again.
author: robin somerfield

review: Freaking awesome , I have 4 FireTVs and now I added the stick. Works flawlessly if you use it a lot , you can notice a little delay in the menus compare to the big FireTV but almost not notizable and for the price, it is a win win. Highly recommend!
author: IL _SAGITARIUM "IL_SAGITARIUM"

review: I really like it. Only disappointment is crackle is not compatible with it..other than that love it.
author: randy

review: I love this!  Got rid of my cable and am enjoying more options including HBO for much less than I was paying per month to the Cable company.  Highly recommend!
author: Amazon Customer

review: I love it i love it can see al my pictures i lisent to all my muisic i harly watch regular television any more 😍😍
author: Kindle Customer

review: streaming is not what I expected
